references: Related: Ord 103618, Ord 101742, Ord 103524. Repealing: Ord 103525.
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the improvement of VALMAY AVENUE NORTHWEST from Northwest 100th Street to 15th Avenue Northwest; and certain other streets and avenues; by asphaltic paving; Local Improvement District No. 6633, and appropriating additional money from the Federal Shared Revenue Fund, Category "Aid to L.I.D.'s ", as allocated in Ordinance No. 103618 in aid thereof, and repealing Ordinance No. 103525 which appropriated $5,200.00 from the City Street Fund in aid of said improvement.
